attributes.action: Traffic calming measures at the junction where Overwoods Rd joins Trinity Rd, Freasley, Tamworth
attributes.additional_details:
After my son, nephew and sister-in-law were all involved in a fatal car accident at this horrendous junction, things need to change, there have been many accidents at this junction over the years and now safety measures are needed to prevent families suffering the way we are. Suggestions are,
1: Speed limit reduction with the introduction of speed enforcement cameras.
2: The installation of traffic lights.
3: In conjunction with 1 & 2 above, more street lighting to be introduced.
